'''Iotham''' is an [[NPC]] located in [[Vimara Village]], [[Sumeru]] who first appears during the ''[[Aranyaka]]'' World Quest ''[[The Children of Vimara Village]]''.

His dialogue changes based on the player's progress through ''Aranyaka''. Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time after completing ''Aranyaka'' gives the player four [[Starshroom]]s.

==Profile==
Iotham was adopted by [[Jehiet]] after his parents, a foreign couple, abandoned him in Vimara Village.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Jehiet}}</ref>

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
Available after completing ''The Children of Vimara Village''.
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Iotham:''' Rana loves Starshrooms! If only I could get some from the forest...
:{{DIcon}} About Rana...
::'''Iotham:''' Rana is amazing, and I want to be just like her when I grow up, a Forest Watcher who adventures in the forest!
:{{DIcon}} About Aranara...
::'''Iotham:''' I don't know... Sorry, but I really can't tell you...
:{{DIcon}} About the story of [[Dvalin|the dragon]]...
::'''Iotham:''' How do I become friends with a dragon? It would be amazing to befriend one!
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Iotham:''' Oh, see you, (Traveler).
{{Dialogue end}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
Replaces Dialogue Set #1 after completing ''The Lost Child''.
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Iotham:''' Sorry! I'll stay out of the forest from now on, Rana...
:{{DIcon}} About Rana...
::'''Iotham:''' Rana is like this because of me...
::{{DIcon}} She'll get better...
::'''Iotham:''' R&mdash;Really?
::'''Iotham:''' By the way, (Traveler), can you keep everything from Sudabeh and Kavus? I don't want them to get worried too.
::'''Iotham:''' They'll sneak out and go after Rana if they find out... But the forest is very dangerous right now...
::{{DIcon}} I promise.
::'''Iotham:''' Thank you, (Traveler). Please, please save Rana... *sob*
:{{DIcon}} I'll do my best to help her.
::'''Iotham:''' Please, (Traveler)...
{{Dialogue end}}

===Dialogue Set #3===
Replaces Dialogue Set #2 after completing the ''Aranyaka'' World Quest series.
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Iotham:''' Thank goodness Rana is alright! But why did she suddenly go traveling? I want to go traveling too...
:{{DIcon}} About Rana...
::'''Iotham:''' Thank you, (Traveler). It's all thanks to you that Rana wakes up again...
::'''Iotham:''' I'll be a good boy for grandma, the village chief, and Rana, from now on. I won't try to explore the dangerous places in the forest.
::'''Iotham:''' I'll grow up to be a great man, and go look for Rana and Arana!
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Keep it up, Iotham.
:::'''Iotham:''' Thank you, (Traveler)! I want to be a great person just like you, and help those in need just as Rana and you did for me!
:::'''Iotham:''' Right, take these Starshrooms, (Traveler). Rana says eating the Starshrooms I picked always lifts her spirits. I hope they can lift your spirits, too!
::;(Obtain [[Starshroom]] ×4)
:{{DIcon}} About Alphonso... ''(Only available after completing ''[[The Bad Guy in Vimara Village]]''?)''{{verify}}
::'''Iotham:''' It's been quite a while since I've seen Alphonso...
::'''Iotham:''' Rana and Alphonso must have left because they have something very important to do.
::'''Iotham:''' I'll eat well and sleep well. When I grow up, it'll be my turn to invite them to play!
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Iotham:''' Oh, see you, (Traveler).
{{Dialogue end}}
